file.name: instore_orders.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
servers:
  - url: https://api.mercadopago.com
info:
  title: Mercado Pago API Reference
  version: '1.0'
paths:
  /mpmobile/instore/qr/{user_id}/{external_id}:
    post:
      tags:
        - $ref: '#/tags/qr-code'
      summary: Create order
      x-summary-i18n:
        eng: Create order
        spa: Crear orden
        por: Criar pedido
      description: Generate a payment order with all the payment information for your product or service and associate it with the Point of Sale you want
      x-description-i18n:
        eng: Generate a payment order with all the payment information for your product or service and associate it with the Point of Sale you want
        spa: Genera una orden de pago asociada a la caja que quieras con toda la información de pago de tu producto o servicio
        por: Gerar uma ordem para associar com a preferência de pagamento e obter a URL necessária para iniciar o fluxo de pagamento
      parameters:
        - name: user_id
          in: path
          description: User Id
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: User Id
            spa: User Id
            por: User Id
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: 12123adfasdf123u4u
        - name: external_id
          in: path
          description: External Id
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: External Id
            spa: External Id
            por: External Id
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: SUC001POS001
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                external_reference:
                  type: string
                  description: Reference you can synchronize with your sale system.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: Reference you can synchronize with your sale system.
                    spa: Referencia que puede sincronizar con su sistema de venta
                    por: Referência que pode sincronizar com seu sistema de vendas
                  example: Factura-0001
                notification_url:
                  type: string
                  description: 
                    URL where you'd like to receive a payment or merchant_order notification.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: URL where you'd like to receive a payment or merchant_order notification.
                    spa: URL a la cual se enviará la notificación de pago o merchant_order.
                    por: URL em que você gostaria de receber uma notificação de pagamento ou merchant_order.
                  example: http://www.yourserver.com
                sponsor_id:
                  type: string
                  description: Mercado Pago's USER_ID of the integrator system.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: Mercado Pago's USER_ID of the integrator system.
                    spa: USER_ID de la cuenta de Mercado Pago del sistema integrador
                    por: USER_ID da conta Mercado Pago do sistema integrador
                  example: '446566691'
                items:
                  type: array
                  description: Information on the products involved in the order.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: Information on the products involved in the order.
                    spa: Información de los productos involucrados en la orden
                    por: Informações sobre os produtos envolvidos no ordem
                  items: 
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      id:
                        type: string
                        description: Item id.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Item id.
                          spa: Identificador del ítem
                          por: Id do anúncio
                        example: 78123172
                      title:
                        type: string
                        example: Shampoo
                        description: Item title.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Item title.
                          spa: Título del ítem
                          por: Título do item
                      currency_id:
                        $ref: '#/components/schemas/currency_id'
                      unit_price:
                        type: number
                        description: Unit price of the item (maximum 2 decimals).
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Unit price of the item (maximum 2 decimals).
                          spa: Precio unitario del producto (máximo 2 decimales)
                          por: Preço unitário do produto (máximo de 2 decimais)
                        example: 120
                      quantity:
                        type: number
                        description: Item quantity.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Item quantity.
                          spa: Cantidad de producto
                          por: Quantidade do produto
                        example: 1
                      description:
                        type: string
                        description: Item description.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Item description.
                          spa: Descripción del item
                          por: Descrição do artigo
                        example: Almendras
                      picture_url:
                        type: string
                        description: Item image URL.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Item image URL.
                          spa: URL de imagen del ítem
                          por: URL da imagem do anúncio
                        example: https://bit.ly/2nxdWHa
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: string
                    example: 360472057-3d2cadbf-2c54-485c-bcb9-f262adc14af6
                    description: id
                  items:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        title:
                          type: string
                          example: Shampoo
                          description: title
                        id:
                          type: string
                          example: 78123172
                          description: id
                        currency_id:
                          $ref: '#/components/schemas/currency_id'
                        unit_price:
                          type: number
                          example: 120
                          description: unit_price
                        quantity:
                          type: number
                          example: 1
                          description: quantity
                        description:
                          type: string
                          example: Almendras
                          description: description
                        picture_url:
                          type: string
                          example: https://bit.ly/2nxdWHa
                          description: picture_url
                    description: items
                  collector_id:
                    type: number
                    example: 360472057
                    description: collector_id
                  collector:
                    type: object
                    description: collector
                  total_amount:
                    type: number
                    example: 120
                    description: total_amount
                  amount:
                    type: number
                    example: 120
                    description: amount
                  external_reference:
                    type: string
                    example: Factura-0001
                    description: external_reference
                  operation_type:
                    type: string
                    example: regular_payment
                    description: operation_type
                  payment_methods:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      excluded_payment_methods:
                        type: array
                        items:
                          type: object
                          properties:
                            id:
                              type: string
                              description: id
                        description: excluded_payment_methods
                      excluded_payment_types:
                        type: array
                        items:
                          type: object
                          properties:
                            id:
                              type: string
                              example: ticket
                              description: id
                        description: excluded_payment_types
                    description: payment_methods
                  marketplace:
                    type: string
                    example: NONE
                    description: marketplace
                  marketplace_fee:
                    type: number
                    example: 0
                    description: marketplace_fee
                  sponsor_id:
                    type: number
                    example: 446566691
                    description: sponsor_id
                  notification_url:
                    type: string
                    example: http://www.yourserver.com
                    description: notification_url
                  back_urls:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      success:
                        type: string
                        description: success
                      pending:
                        type: string
                        description: pending
                      failure:
                        type: string
                        description: failure
                    description: back_urls
                  payer:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      id:
                        type: number
                        example: 0
                        description: id
                      email:
                        type: string
                        description: email
                      identification:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          number:
                            type: string
                            description: number
                          type:
                            type: string
                            description: type
                        description: identification
                      address:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          primary:
                            type: boolean
                            description: primary
                          zip:
                            type: string
                            description: zip
                        description: address
                      phone:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          area_code:
                            type: string
                            description: area_code
                          number:
                            type: string
                            description: number
                        description: phone
                    description: payer
                  expires:
                    type: boolean
                    description: expires
                  additional_info:
                    type: string
                    description: additional_info
                  site_id:
                    type: string
                    example: mla
                    description: site_id
                  client_id:
                    type: number
                    example: 360472057
                    description: client_id
                  processing_modes:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      type: string
                      example: aggregator
                    description: processing_modes
                  internal_metadata:
                    type: object
                    description: internal_metadata
        '400':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - invalid_collector_id--collector_id invalid.
                      - invalid_sponsor_id--sponsor_id is not an active user.
                      - invalid_items--unit_price invalid.
                      - invalid_access_token--Access denied.
    delete:
      tags:
        - $ref: '#/tags/qr-code'
      summary: Delete order
      x-summary-i18n:
        eng: Delete order
        spa: Eliminar orden
        por: Excluir pedido
      description: Delete an order whenever you need to with the ID of the user and the external ID
      x-description-i18n:
        eng: Delete an order whenever you need to with the ID of the user and the external ID
        spa: Elimina una orden creada siempre que lo necesites con el ID del vendedor y de la caja
        por: Exclua uma ordem criada sempre que for necessário com o ID do vendedor e a caixa
      parameters:
        - name: user_id
          in: path
          description: User Id
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: User Id
            spa: User Id
            por: User Id
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: 446566691
        - name: external_id
          in: path
          description: External Id
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: External Id
            spa: External Id
            por: External Id
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: SUC001POS001
      responses:
        '400':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - invalid_collector_id--COLLECTOR_ID invalid.
                      - invalid_access_token--access denied.


components:
  schemas:
    currency_id:
      type: string
      example: COP
      description: Currency identifier in ISO_4217 format.
      x-description-i18n:
        eng: Currency identifier in ISO_4217 format.
        spa: Identificador de moneda en formato ISO_4217
        por: Identificador de moeda no formato ISO_4217
      enum: 
        - ARS -- Argentine peso.
        - BRL -- Brazil real.
        - CLP -- Chilean peso.
        - MXN -- Mexican peso.
        - COP -- Colombian peso.
        - PEN -- Peruvian sol.
        - UYU -- Uruguayan peso.

Error:
unmarshal: yaml: unmarshal errors:
  yaml: line 1: cannot unmarshal !!map into string; yaml: line 1: cannot unmarshal !!map into string
